name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 Giant Island Dungeon / 巨人アイランド / 巨人島
detailed_description:
A harder, better, faster, stronger Neptunia dungeon, you say? The Giant Island DLC unlocks a new area, Giant's Island - an island inhabited by stronger enemies! The enemy's HP are much higher and are a lot tougher to defeat, so make sure you have all the right tools to claim victory!

Progress through Giant's Island and gain even more experience points!

How to Unlock in-Game: Giant's Island can be unlocked from Chapter 8. The dungeon is unlocked through plans.

This dungeon and the enemies that appear in this dungeon (Giant Island) are the same for Rebirth1, Rebirth2, and Rebirth3.
about_the_game:
A harder, better, faster, stronger Neptunia dungeon, you say? The Giant Island DLC unlocks a new area, Giant's Island - an island inhabited by stronger enemies! The enemy's HP are much higher and are a lot tougher to defeat, so make sure you have all the right tools to claim victory!

Progress through Giant's Island and gain even more experience points!

How to Unlock in-Game: Giant's Island can be unlocked from Chapter 8. The dungeon is unlocked through plans.

This dungeon and the enemies that appear in this dungeon (Giant Island) are the same for Rebirth1, Rebirth2, and Rebirth3.
short_description: The Giant's Island DLC brings exactly that - an island inhabited by stronger enemies! A perfect place to relax in the sun and grind!

fullgame.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 / 超次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth1 / 超次次元遊戲戰機少女重生1

supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version. On-board graphics card are not recommend. Highly recommend to have an independent graphics card.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or 8 (64bit) or newer
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version
